bibl.title: P. Mich. inv. 4219: A Wooden Label Used as a Wooden Board and as a Mummy Label. Avec résumé en grec.
bibl.note: On one side, mummy label written in Demotic [ed.: Wilhelm SPIEGELBERG, Zur Bestattung der Mumien in der römischen Kaiserzeit, ZÄS 66 (1930) p. 39]. On the other side, receipt for the payment of e‡skrisiw for entering hereditary offices of the priests. Phenebythis (Panopolite nome), September 3, A.D. 139. "Which side was written first cannot be said with certainty." <eiskrisis>
LITINAS Nikos, P. Mich. inv. 4219: A Wooden Label Used as a Wooden Board and as a Mummy Label. Avec résumé en grec.
